root: ^I am home alone and in the shower when suddenly all the bathroom cabinets open and all the stuff inside flies out of them.
^This feels like there is a ghost in my bathroom. What should I do?
^Yell out that I am not scared
^Command that whoever is there needs to leave

res1: ^After I yell this all the soaps and shampoos fall over in the shower and spill everywhere causing me to slip and fall.

^After I yelled I wasn't scared, the shampoos and soaps fell over and spilled and I immediately slipped on them and fell and hit my head on the faucet. I think I woke up 20 minutes later and was bleeding and had to call 911. I had a bad gash on my head and now I am terrified of my own home! Something is there.
res2: ^After I say this, the lights flicker on and off and I hear a window in the house open and slam shut.

^Wow, I didn't know if that would work or not... but there was definitely some other being in the house with me. I guess I just needed to talk with the being and be blunt with it. I have read that before, that you just need to tell spirits to leave... and it seemed to work!
res3: ^I run out of the bathroom and out of my place and it takes me a minute to realize I am naked outside.

^I was so scared I ran all the way outside with no clothes on and soaking wet with shampoo still in my hair. I realize after a minute or so when I collect my breath and my thoughts, but by that time one of my neighbors has already filmed me and uploaded the video online and now I am famous on the internet... not how I want to be famous.
global decl: ^This feels like there is a ghost in my bathroom. What should I do?
